sentence.Network_en: Mirrors have a backing of quicksilver.
One of them, the first to alight, hastened with quicksilver steps towards me.

sentence.Network_en: By heaven, they ought to be worked in quicksilver mines.
sentence.Network_cn: 但愿苍天有眼, 让他们到水银矿上去作苦工.

encyclopedia.content: Quiksilver 标志 logo：品牌介绍： 设计生产并销售服装，配饰以及相关产品，并且推广一种代表著休闲轻松生活方式的品牌；这一切都来源于其生产冲浪板类产品的历史。Quiksilver不断推出创新性的产品，举办激动人心的相关赛事，并在全球拥 有出色的零售网路，无一不是Quiksilver卓越实力的体现。 Quiksilver的主打产品就是专为年轻人士提供的旗下各类品牌的服装，包Quiksilver, Roxy, DC Shoes, Raisins, Radio Fiji和Island Soul l

entry.def: Quicksilver is the same as mercury .

entry.tran: （动作、变化）极快的；变化无常的;变幻莫测的
entry.def: Quicksilver movements or changes are very fast and unpredictable.

means.word_mean: 1. a heavy silvery toxic univalent and bivalent metallic element; the only metal that is liquid at ordinary temperatures
